text: Ricardo Migliorisi (January 6, 1948 – June 14, 2019)Falleció Ricardo Migliorisi was a Paraguayan painter, costume designer, scenery designer and architect. Migliorisi won national and international awards. Migliorisi showed his work in many countries. He was born in Asunción, Paraguay. His characters are considered none too realistic, and may represent popular Latin-American subjects, animals and classic mythology, opera, circus and cabaret characters, the television and socialite, all of them with crazy tendencies. Migliorisi was hospitalized in May 2019 under intensive therapy. He died on June 14, 2019 at the age of 71. ==References== ==Other websites== * Enciclopedia Encarta * Iberoamérica pinta Category:1948 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Painters from South America Category:Architects Category:Paraguayan people
